longDef.en: something strange or not known that has not yet been explained or understood
longDef.cn: 神秘的事物，难以理解的事物，谜

examples.en: How the massive stones were brought here from hundreds of miles away is/remains a mystery.
examples.cn: 巨石是怎样从几百英里之外运到这里来的仍是个谜。

examples.en: The mystery was solved when the police discovered the murder weapon.
examples.cn: 警察找到凶器后，谜团便解开了。

examples.en: The book tries to explain some of the mysteries of life.
examples.cn: 该书试图解释一些生命之谜。

examples.en: The details of the scandal remain cloaked/shrouded/wrapped in mystery.
examples.cn: 丑闻的详情仍然不明／是一个谜／披着神秘的面纱。

examples.en: It's a complete mystery (to me) that/why (= I do not understand why) she married him at all!
examples.cn: 我完全弄不懂她怎么会嫁给他！

longDef.en: a book, film, or play, especially about a crime or a murder, with a surprise ending that explains all the strange events that have happened
longDef.cn: 悬疑作品;悬疑电影;推理剧

examples.cn: 我很爱看谋杀推理作品。
